posts.post_title: T215 - Red Cross Solly Hofman - SOLD
posts.post_content:
SOLD

Crease looks worse in scan, some pl on the back.

[IMG]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5328/8836706472_4667b6bd6b_c.jpg[/IMG]
4 minutes, thats a record for me.
Wow that's a nice looking card! Is this the same type of card that some argue to count as a t206 back ?

[quote name="Joshchisox08" post=1407147]Wow that's a nice looking card! Is this the same type of card that some argue to count as a t206 back ?[/QUOTE]

Some do but more count the T213-1 Coupons as T206s, neither are nor will they ever be T206s. To me it's crazy.....but then again, I am what I am :). Others can think they are but if they ever get them slabbed they will be disappointed as no grading company thinks they are (because they aren't).

[quote name="Leon" post=1407157]Some do but more count the T213-1 Coupons as T206s, neither are nor will they ever be T206s. To me it's crazy.....but then again, I am what I am :). Others can think they are but if they ever get them slabbed they will be disappointed as no grading company thinks they are (because they aren't).[/QUOTE]

Lol I don't understand it either but I probably would want to get at least one of each just to have one. How much do these and the Coupons usually go for ? I'm assuming not cheap.
